The Ninjago Lightning Dragon Battle is probably the most eye pleasing Ninjago set I've seen. The Lightning dragon sits on top of a stand up shelving structure in my brother's bedroom, and boy does it looks good! It's head piece is magnificently painted while it's massive wingspan makes it looks like the king of beasts!

Pieces: All of the pieces, colors, and shapes are a perfect fit. I just loved how there are so many special and transparent pieces included in this set! The body and tail are longer on this dragon making it look more majestic and powerful! It's complete with lots of ball and socket joints which is great! It stays up on its hind legs and everything!
column4: of gold and some really great asian character printed bricks. Jay stays firmly in his little seat and the dragon does not fall apart when lifted, (unlike the dragon in the Fire Temple (2011).
column8: - The copter also has some good pieces such as the teeth pieces, a little bit of purple, the blade as the back rotor, the winch, the skull heads as missiles,(although they make awful missiles), the rotor blades, the tire frames,(big and little). This set has some great pieces for building!

column1: Minifigs: The minifigures in this set are definitely good ones. They are great for Ninjago collectors. Jay DX right in his element, and his only appearance in a box set. Sensei Wu in his black gettup looks sharp, just like his awesome asian hat. General Kruncha looks pretty good, except I fear his head piece was made in China. Never the less it is probably one of the best Chinese elements I have seen. Frakjaw as the pilot was a good idea because his hat comes in the set anyways. He also looks pretty nice inside that cockpit. (Don't ask me how he sees out of there?)
Flaws:This set only has one minor flaw for me, and that is the fact that it has no exciting technical contraptions that Ninjago sets usually include.

All in all I would highly reccomend this set for show and for a fun building and playing experience. The regular price is good and there are no disgusting cheap chinese manufactured pieces. This set appeals everyone and especially cildren! (No rude intentions towards China). If only Ninjago would stay this good!

This was one of those sets i got a great price on a few months ago - now i thought i would review it!
Figures - Some very good stuff here, Jay DX Is a awesome figure. OG Black wu is also very nice. Kruncha is an ok fig, Frakjaw with a pilot helmet is so funny
Parts - Some good stuff here too. Purple blade, exclusive moulded dragon head, printed flags, and Ball joints.
Building the set was pretty fun, some interesting techniques here. did feel somewhat repetetive.
Play value - I think the inclusion of a bad guy helicopter adds some good fun here. Ball shooter is always fun too, so many hours of fun with this set.
Value. Price per piece is kinda high on this one, but as i said before you can have so much fun with this set.

Overall - YES. Incredible set. Not much wrong here. the only issue really is that the little prison thing on the helicopter flies off a bit easily. Very expensive to get your hands on this thing however as it was not sold in stores very long.
